data.title: language speakers grew by nearly 38,000 persons
data.text: According to Statistics Finland's statistics on population structure, the official total population of Finland was 5,563,970 at the end of 2022. In the course of 2022, Finlandâ€™s population grew by 15,729 persons. The number of persons speaking Finnish, Swedish or Sami as their native language went down by 22,221 persons, and the number of foreign-language speakers grew by 37,950 persons, which is most in at least 40 years. The statistics do not include Ukrainians who have been granted a residence permit under the Temporary Protection Directive.
